effect: [AUTO]:[Put this card into your soul] When this unit is put into your bind zone from (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Chronofang" in its card name, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
